-1.title: Episode dated 28 June 2014
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: "Nightline" returns to primetime with a series of one-hour programs. "Nightline Prime" will use the newest technologies to put viewers in the middle of stories as they unfold. The new program puts the latest small, agile cameras out with journalists embedded at the center of stories they are reporting.
imdb.title: Nightline Prime
plot: "Nightline" returns to primetime with a series of one-hour programs. "_Nightline Prime_ (qv)" will use the newest technologies to put viewers in the middle of stories as they unfold. The new program puts the latest small, agile cameras out with journalists embedded at the center of stories they are reporting.
